ParameterDescription.Varchar: Variable length text from MIN_CHARS to MAX_CHARS (MAX_CHARS = INFINITY meaning arbitrary length)
ParameterDescription.Select: Select one option. Options should pass only the "Value".
ParameterDescription.Uri: Absolute or relative URL, restricted to Locator(s) of the supplied URL if not null.   Up to a MAX_LENGTH in length.
